channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- VMware vRealize Log Insight
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- VMware vRealize Log Insight

item.title: CVE-2018-6980|2024-08-05T06:17:17.509Z -- vmware -- vmware%20vrealize%20log%20insight
item.description: VMware vRealize Log Insight (4.7.x before 4.7.1 and 4.6.x before 4.6.2) contains a vulnerability due to improper authorization in the user registration method. Successful exploitation of this issue may allow Admin users with view only permission to perform certain administrative functions which they are not allowed to perform.
